argument.name: tablename
argument.description: The table to put into the zip file. If the table is in the current database, it is not necessary to specify the full drive and path.

argument.name: zipfilename
argument.description: Optional. Default = Table_Name with the .ZIP extension. The name of the zip file to create.

argument.name: options
argument.description: Optional. Options is a string that can include one or more of the following flags:

item.name: P
item.description: Display the "Zip Table" dialog box. If "P" not specified, the table is zipped without any user prompting.

page.description: Zip a table. Options "d" - include Dictionary, "x" - include Indexes, "p" - display prompt dialog.
page.discussion: The TABLE.ZIP() method creates a zip file containing the table specified by Table_Name. If the table specified by Table_Name is in the current database, it is not necessary to specify the full drive and path. Note : To zip a set, use the .ZIP() method.

section.title: Example
section.description: This script zips a table and includes the dictionary and indexes.
